member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalendarViewMode
member.summary: This is an Enum. It provides a two types of views to display the month and year view of calendar.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalendarViewMode.SFCalendarViewModeMonth
member.summary: Displays the dates are in month visual representation. It is default mode,

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalendarViewMode.SFCalendarViewModeYear
member.summary: Displays the dates of calendar in year visual representation.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalendarDayLabelTextAlignment
member.summary: Aligns the label in the Calendar control in either of the directions.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalendarDayLabelTextAlignment.SFCalendarDayLabelTextAlignmentRight
member.summary: Aligns the label towards the right.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalendarDayLabelTextAlignment.SFCalendarDayLabelTextAlignmentCenter
member.summary: Aligns the label towards the center.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalendarDayLabelTextAlignment.SFCalendarDayLabelTextAlignmentLeft
member.summary: Aligns the label towards the left.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalenderSelectionMode
member.summary: This is an Enum. It represents the count of date cell has been selected. It has three values namely SingleSelection,MultiSelection and RangeSelection.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalenderSelectionMode.SFCalenderSelectionModeSingle
member.summary: Allows to select only one date in month.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalenderSelectionMode.SFCalenderSelectionModeMultiple
member.summary: Allows to select the multiple dates in month.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalenderSelectionMode.SFCalenderSelectionModeRange
member.summary: Allows to select the continuous range of dates in month.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalendarTransitionType
member.summary: This is an Enum. It provides a four types of transition animations while changing month.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalendarTransitionType.SFCalendarTransitionTypeScroll
member.summary: The scroll transition animation will appear while changing month.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalendarTransitionType.SFCalendarTransitionTypeReveal
member.summary: The reveal transition animation will appear while changing month.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalendarTransitionType.SFCalendarTransitionTypeCard
member.summary: The card transition animation will appear while changing month.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.SFCalendarTransitionType.SFCalendarTransitionTypeFloat
member.summary: The float transition animation will appear while changing month.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.NSTextAlignment
member.summary: This is an Enum. It represents the alignment position of day label in calendar month view and yearview.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.NSTextAlignment.NSTextAlignmentLeft
member.summary: Aligns the label towards the left.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.NSTextAlignment.NSTextAlignmentCenter
member.summary: Aligns the label towards the center.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.iOS.NSTextAlignment.NSTextAlignmentRight
member.summary: Aligns the label towards the right.
